description: Officially, this revolver can fit 25 different calibers in its chambers, but this comes at the cost of having a rather finicky reloading process and somewhat reduced accuracy. Only a few hundred of these were made before the company went bankrupt, and somehow this one has ended up in your hands.

variants.description: Officially, this revolver can fit 25 different calibers in its chambers, but this comes at the cost of having a rather finicky reloading process and somewhat reduced accuracy. Only a few hundred of these were made before the company went bankrupt, and somehow this one has ended up in your hands.

//: It can't fit the 9x18mm the Makarov uses because they're LIARS and it's actually 9.2mm.

description: A rather recent introduction to the competition shooting market, this pistol has several innovations such as a non-reciprocating slide, a very low bore axis, and more, resulting in a highly accurate and reliable sidearm with little to no recoil. Good luck finding the magazines, though.

variants.description: A rather recent introduction to the competition shooting market, the Laugo Alien has several innovations such as a non-reciprocating slide, a very low bore axis, and more, resulting in a highly accurate and reliable sidearm with little to no recoil. Good luck finding the magazines, though.

A rather recent introduction to the competition shooting market, the Laugo Alien has several innovations such as a non-reciprocating slide, a very low bore axis, and more, resulting in a highly accurate and reliable sidearm with little to no recoil. Good luck finding the magazines, though.

A rather recent introduction to the competition shooting market, the Laugo Alien has several innovations such as a non-reciprocating slide, a very low bore axis, and more, resulting in a highly accurate and reliable sidearm with little to no recoil. Good luck finding the magazines, though.

A rather recent introduction to the competition shooting market, the Laugo Alien has several innovations such as a non-reciprocating slide, a very low bore axis, and more, resulting in a highly accurate and reliable sidearm with little to no recoil. This version has a 1911-style grip, as opposed to the Glock or Luger style of the original version.

//: No sight slot, not by itself. The Alien has interchangeable slides instead.

description: Made for the Laugo Alien, this magazine holds 17 rounds.
Uniquely, the Laugo Alien uses replaceable slides instead of a sight rail. This one contains basic iron sights.

name.str: Laugo Alien red dot sight slide

description: Uniquely, the Laugo Alien uses replaceable slides instead of a sight rail. This one contains a sleek red dot sight.
Uniquely, the Laugo Alien uses replaceable slides instead of a sight rail. This one a Picatinny rail for attaching a normal sight, but no iron sights.
